attributes.action: Stop the legislation that will ban smoking in cars
attributes.additional_details:
What we do in our own cars is our own business. We should not be forced to stop smoking in our own property because anti-smoking campaigners want to control what we do.

We know the dangers of smoking but its OUR property and they are OUR children. It is down to the parent how to raise them, by all means make people aware of dangers but banning smoking in OUR cars will be in violation of our rights.

Lets stop this legislation going through before they ban us from smoking in our own homes too.

Its our lives and we choose to live them that way. DO NOT let them tell us how we should raise our own children and how we should act within our own properties whether it be our houses or our cars.
